item.title: On the Road: Sketch Burger
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:

The post On the Road: Sketch Burger appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
Recently we stumbled upon what might be the best burger place around… in Philadelphia! Consider this the first issue of Chow Down Orlando on the Road.

What you see above is the truffle butter and sautéed mushroom burger found at Sketch Burger in Philadelphia. All the burgers are 8 oz patties cooked to perfection and this one was no exception. It’s a big burger, but with the mushrooms and truffle butter, it was worth every single bite.

Sketch Burger gets it’s name from all the hand drawn ‘sketches’ that cover the walls. There are pieces of construction paper and crayons at every table and guests are encouraged to decorate the walls. It’s a fun place that enhances the crazy good burgers.

We need one of these in the Mills/50 area. Pronto!

If you’re in Philadelphia, you can find Sketch Burger Girard Ave area of Philadelphia. You’ll be happy to you went looking.

The post On the Road: Sketch Burger appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
